Messages.tinyURLEngine: Bitly API is not able to generate tiny URL.
Messages.geoLocation: You are currently outside the supported area.
Messages.addressToLocate: Enter an Address or Parcel ID to locate.
Messages.streetToLocate: Enter a road or street name to locate.
Messages.unableToLocate: Unable to locate specified street or road.
Messages.unableToLocateParcel: Unable to locate specified address or parcel.
Messages.noParcel: Parcel not found at current location.
Messages.unableToPerform: Unable To Perform Operation, Invalid Geometry.
Messages.noRoad: Road not found at current location.
Messages.inValidAveryFormat: Invalid Avery format. Please select a valid format from the dropdown list.
Messages.fileSelect: Select atleast one file format to download.
Messages.selectProperty: Select Property Owners or Occupants to notify.
Messages.createBuffer: Geometry for Buffer is Null in Create Buffer
Messages.noDataAvailable: Data not available for this particular location
Messages.fetchRoadInformation: An error occured while fetching road information.
